SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVRLayerUnion

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRLayerUnion
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class OVRLayerUnion extends Struct implements NativeResource
Union that combines ovrLayer types in a way that allows them to be used in a polymorphic way.

Layout


 union ovrLayer_Union {
     ovrLayerHeader Header();
     ovrLayerEyeFov EyeFov;
     ovrLayerEyeFovDepth EyeFovDepth;
     ovrLayerEyeMatrix EyeMatrix;
     ovrLayerEyeFovMultires Multires;
     ovrLayerCylinder Cylinder;
     ovrLayerCube Cube;
     ovrLayerQuad Quad;
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • OVRLayerUnion

      public OVRLayerUnion(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a OVRLayerUnion instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
